Quote: Ce n'est pas en suivant le rythme que je serais le meilleur.
Author: Izuku Midoriya

Quote: It’s hard to beat someone who never give up.
Author: Babe Ruth

Quote: Dear me, one day I’ll make you proud.
Author: Charlotte Eriksson

Quote: Everyday you have one job, be better than yesterday.
Author: Ada Ehi

Quote: Concentrez vos pensées sur la chose en particulier qui vous intéresse le plus et les idées viendront en abondance et ouvriront la porte à une douzaine de façons d’atteindre votre objectif.
Author: Robert Collier

Quote: Never tell anyone what you’re doing until it’s done.
Author: Unknown

Quote: Peu importe ce que tu veux faire, fais le maintenant. On repousse trop souvent aux lendemains.
Author: Inconnu

Quote: Le moment ne sera jamais le bon. Commencez de là où vous êtes et travaillez avec les outils qui se trouvent sous votre main. Vous trouverez de meilleurs outils au fur et à mesure.
Author: Inconnu

Quote: Your lack of dedication is an insult to those who believe in you.
Author: Unknown

Quote: Je ne te souhaite pas bonne chance, je te souhaite de travailler à la hauteur de tes objectifs.
Author: Inconnu

Quote: Life is not a game because in a game you’re playing against someone else, if you lose they win, if you win they lose. In life, you’re not playing against anyone and someone else winning or losing has no effect on you.
Author: Unknown

Quote: You can. End of story.
Author: Unknown

Quote: Be addicted to your passion instead of distraction.
Author: Unknown

Quote: You have to make it fun and enjoyable in your own mind to get up and do the hard things.
Author: Unknown

Quote: The problem is not the problem. The problem is your attitude about the problem
Author: Captain Jack Sparrow

Quote: Le talent ca s'épanouit, l'instint ca se perfectionne.
Author: Oikawa Tooru

Quote: On ne peut pas gagner sans motivation.
Author: Daichi Sawamura

Quote: Les gens ne cesseront jamais d'avoir des rêves !
Author: Marshall D Teach

Quote: Le talent touche une cible que personne d’autre ne peut frapper ; le génie touche une cible que personne d’autre ne peut voir.
Author: Arthur Schopenhauer

Quote: Le destin ? Je l'éclate et j'en fait ce que je veux !
Author: Yami Sukehiro

Quote: Ce qui compte c'est pas d'avoir beaucoup de temps , c'est de savoir s'en servir.
Author: Ekko

Quote: Les limites existent uniquement si tu le permets.
Author: Vegeta

Quote: Je ne crains pas l’homme qui a pratiqué 10.000 coups une fois, mais je crains l’homme qui a pratiqué un coup 10.000 fois.
Author: Bruce Lee

Quote: Tous les hommes finissent par mourir un jour... Mais leur savoir reste.
Author: Senku Ishigami

Quote: Ne pas avoir peur est la chose la plus terrifiante qui sois.
Author: Karma Akabane

Quote: En ce bas monde, la seule chose qui nous appartient vraiment... c’est le corps qu’on se forge chaque jour.
Author: Ken Kitano

Quote: Le fait d'être visé par tout le monde montre votre puissance.
Author: Professeur Koro

Quote: Vous riez de moi car je suis différent mais moi je ris de vous car vous êtes tous les mêmes. Kaneki Ken
Author: Kaneki Ken

Quote: L'homme qui n'a rien à perdre est le plus dangereux de tous les adversaires.
Author: Chris Carter

Quote: Ne pleure pas pour ta défaite, garde tes larmes pour la victoire
Author: Natsu Dragnir

Quote: La chute n'est pas un échec. L'échec c'est de rester là ou on est tombé
Author: Socrate

Quote: Peu importe combien de points vous avez à la fin du jeu, si vous n'êtes pas heureux, ce n'est pas une victoire.
Author: Kuroko Tetsuya

Quote: This is the real secret of life to be completely engaged with what you are doing in the here and now. And instead of calling it work, realize it is play.
Author: Alan Watts

Quote: S'il y'a la moindre possibilité, il est de ton devoir d'avancer.
Author: Mustang

Quote: La force s'acquiert par la répétition de l'effort. Subir la défaire et savourer la victoire, c'est comme ça que nous grandirons !
Author: Aoi Todo

Quote: Rester debout c'est une sacrée preuve de force !
Author: Katsuki Bakugo

Quote: Un raté peut dépasser un génie par en entraînement acharné.
Author: Rock Lee

Quote: Ne jamais remettre à demain ce que tu peux faire aujourd'hui.
Author: 2pac

Quote: Je n'ai pas ce qu'il faut pour être le héros principal mais dans chaque bonne histoire il y a un second rôle qui éclipse le héros.
Author: Neito Monoma

Quote: Pour avoir quelque chose que tu n'as jamais eu, il faut faire quelque chose que tu n'as jamais fait.
Author: Robert McCall

Quote: Quelque soit la vérité, ce sont les vainqueurs qui écriront l'histoire.
Author: Livaï Ackerman

Quote: Si vous ne faites pas les choses pour lesquelles vous n'êtes pas doué vous ne ferez jamais de progrès.
Author: Rachel Zane

Quote: To be successful at anything, you don't have to be different. You simply have to be what most people aren't : consistent.
Author: Unknown

Quote: Quand je dis que ça ne fait pas mal. Cela signifie que je peux le supporter.
Author: Kirua zoldik

Quote: Dans la vie il n'est pas interdit de pleurer, mais cela ne doit en aucun cas t'empêcher d'avancer.
Author: Shanks Le Roux

Quote: La justice vaincra t-elle ? Bien sûr que oui ! Parce que la justice n'appartient qu'aux vainqueurs !
Author: Donquixote Doflamingo

Quote: Celui qui n'a pas d'objectifs ne risque pas de les atteindre
Author: Sun Tzu

Quote: Je ne reviens jamais sur ma parole, c’est ça pour moi être un ninja !
Author: Naruto Uzumaki

Quote: Être faible n'est pas une honte, mais le rester, si !
Author: Fuegoleon Vermillion

Quote: Il n'est de plus grand amour que celui de l'homme qui se sacrifie pour ses compagnons.
Author: AinzOoalGown

Quote: Je suis peut-être un caillou, mais je suis un caillou capable de briser un diamant.
Author: Asta

Quote: L'espoir n'existe que pour ceux qui ne peuvent pas vivre sans s'accrocher.
Author: Sosuke Aizen

Quote: j'ai appris que le courage n'est pas l'absence de peur mais la capacité de la vaincre
Author: Kirito

Quote: Tant qu'il existera des vainqueurs il y aura des vaincus.
Author: Madara Uchiwa

Quote: Vous êtes bien dans un jeu vidéo, mais vous n'êtes plus là pour jouer.
Author: Sword Art Online

Quote: Someone said « Don’t be afraid to start over again. This time you’re not starting from scratch, you’re starting from experience ».
Author: Unknown

Quote: Une fois lancé on se dit toujours « J’aurais du commencer plus tôt » alors fais-le maintenant pour ne pas avoir de regrets plus tard.
Author: Inconnu

Quote: It’s you vs you. Everyday. Always has been.
Author: Unknown

Quote: La réussite ce n’est pas juste faire de l’argent, c’est de vivre ta propre vie comme tu l’entends.
Author: Inconnu

Quote: I have one power, I never give up.
Author: Batman

Quote: The most effective way to do it is to do it.
Author: Amelia Earhart

Quote: It’s the will, not the skill.
Author: Jim Tunney

Quote: Just focus and do it.
Author: Unknown

Quote: Be one of the few who do what they say.
Author: Unknown

Quote: Focus on what you really want. Everything else is a distraction.
Author: Unknown

Quote: Set your goals so high so people think you're insane.
Author: Unknown

Quote: The only way to do great work is to love what you do. If you haven’t found it yet, keep lookin, don’t settle.
Author: Steve Jobs

Quote: Dans le domaine des idées, tout dépend de l’enthousiasme. Dans le monde réel, tout repose sur la persévérance.
Author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

Quote: C’est clairement plus dur pour nous. Et alors ? La victoire aura deux fois plus de goût.
Author: Inconnu

Quote: Just because I give you advice doesn’t mean I know more than you. It just means I’ve done more stupid shit than you.
Author: Unknown

Quote: If you are in the way of my dreams and goals, I suggest you move.
Author: Unknown

Quote: Ça sera facile ? Pas du tout. Ça en vaudra la peine ? Absolument !
Author: Inconnu

Quote: Listen, smile, agree and then do whatever the fuck you were gonna do anyway.
Author: Robert Downey Jr

Quote: If you don’t play to win, don’t play at all.
Author: Tom Brady

Quote: Just because I carry it well does not mean it is not heavy.
Author: Unknown

Quote: Every next level of you life will demand a different you.
Author: Leonardo Di Caprio

Quote: And now go, make interesting mistakes, make amazing mistakes, make glorious and fantastic mistakes.
Author: Neil Gaiman

Quote: If you quit once it becomes a habit. Never quit.
Author: Michael Jordan

Quote: Don’t think about what can happen in a month. Don’t think about what can happen in a year. Just focus on the 24 hours in front of you and do what you can to get closer to where you want to be.
Author: Eric Thomas

Quote: Laisse les te haïr, assure-toi qu'ils épellent bien ton nom.
Author: Harvey Specter

Quote: Si vous n'y allez pas à fond, à quoi bon y aller ?
Author: Inconnu

Quote: Arrête de vouloir te motiver. Soit tu te mets au boulot, soit tu te plais. Mais arrête de te trouver des excuses.
Author: Inconnu

Quote: Observe and reflect; and become a little wiser every day.
Author: Doe Zantamata

Quote: You may see me struggle but you will never see me quit.
Author: Unknown

Quote: Si vous ne pouvez exceller par le talent, triomphez par l'effort.
Author: Dave Weinbaum

Quote: Destroy the idea that you have to be constantly working or grinding in order to be successful. Embrace the concept that rest, recovery, and reflection are essential parts of the progress towards a successful and ultimately happy life
Author: Damson Idris

Quote: If you start now you'll begin seeing results one day earlier than if you start tomorrow
Author: Jairek Robbins

Quote: Life is not about being better than someone else, it's about being better than you used to be and becoming who you are.
Author: Will Smith

Quote: Il y a un an, c'était impossible. Aujourd'hui, tout m'est possible.
Author: Unknown

Quote: If you want to win the game of life. You first have to define what winning is.
Author: Joe Duncan

Quote: Si tu as le temps de t'apitoyer, tu as le temps de t'améliorer.
Author: Saitama

Quote: The most attractive thing a man can do is exactly what he said he's going to do.
Author: Unknown

Quote: Make your life a masterpiece. Imagine no limitations on what you can be, have or do.
Author: Brian Tracy

Quote: Sometimes all you need is 20 seconds of insane courage, just literally 20 seconds of embarrassing bravery. I promise you something great will come out of it.
Author: Benjamin Mee

Quote: L'argent est juste un outil, pas le but.. Le but, c'est la liberté !
Author: Inconnu

Quote: You only look crazy until it works, then you're a genius.
Author: Unknown

Quote: Always remember, beginning is the hardest part.
Author: Unknown

Quote: Oh you're tired ? Leave the hard work for the big boys.
Author: Unknown

Quote: Ideas are cheap, ideas are easy, ideas are common. Everybody has ideas, ideas are higly, higly overvalued. Execution is all that matters.
Author: Casey Neistat

Quote: Do it with passion or not at all.
Author: Rosa Nochette Carey

Quote: Seuls ceux qui prennent le risque d'échouer spectaculairement réussiront brillamment.
Author: Robert Francis Kennedy

Quote: C'est lorsqu'ils dont dos au mur que les grands joueurs se révèlent.
Author: Inconnu

Quote: I want to see what happens if I don't give up.
Author: Neila Rey

Quote: Nous sommes ce que nous faisons à plusieurs reprises. L'excellence n'est donc pas un acte mais une habitude.
Author: Aristote

Quote: Yesterday you said tomorrow.
Author: Nike

Quote: The size of your audience doesn't matter. Keep up the good work.
Author: Unknown

Quote: When they say you can't do it, do it twice, and take pics.
Author: Tami Xiang

Quote: The funny thing is when you start feeling happy alone, that's when everyone decides to be with you.
Author: Jim Carrey

Quote: The quality of a person's life is in direct proportion to their commitment to excellence.
Author: Vince Lombardi

Quote: Live as if you were living already for the second time and as if you had acted the first time as wrongly as you are about to act now.
Author: Viktor E. Frankl

Quote: Perfection is not attainable. But if we chase perfection we can catch excellence.
Author: Vince Lombardi

Quote: We are here to laugh at the odds and live our lives so well that death will tremble to take us.
Author: Charles Bukowski

Quote: If you want to look good in front of thousands, you have to outwork thousands in front of nobody.
Author: Damian Lillard

Quote: Doing more than what's expected. That's greatness.
Author: Unknown

Quote: Act today as if this the day you will be remembered.
Author: Dr. Seuss

Quote: The one who wins is the one who does whatever it takes.
Author: Unknown

Quote: Go all out or don't go at all.
Author: Unknown

Quote: Be somebody nobody thought you could be.
Author: Unknown

Quote: Anyone can dream it. Show the world you can do it.
Author: Walt Disney

Quote: Consistency is what transforms average into excellence.
Author: Tony Robins

Quote: Be one of the few who do what they say.
Author: Unknown

Quote: Everything is possible. The impossible just takes longer.
Author: Dan Brown

Quote: The biggest moutains are always climbed the same way every time; one step at a time.
Author: Unknown

Quote: If you can't outplay them. Outwork them.
Author: Ben Hogan

Quote: Greatness is demanding more of yourself than anyone else could ever demand of you. When others say : "done" you say "next".
Author: Unknown

Quote: The most certain way to succeed is to try one more time.
Author: Thomas Edison

Quote: Anything worth doing is worth doing badly. Until you do it right.
Author: Zig Ziglar

Quote: You can't do epic shit with basic people.
Author: Unknown

Quote: You are your own best friend. Never, ever put yourself down.
Author: Paulo Coelho

Quote: They said "it's difficult", I said "bring it on".
Author: Unknown

Quote: Personne ne peut changer le monde sans avoir d'obsession.
Author: Inconnu

Quote: Find people who are better than you and play with them.
Author: Unknown

Quote: Have you ever stopped and thought : "Wow, I prayed for this, it's here, it's happening."
Author: Unknown

Quote: It's not about the cards you've been dealt. It's how you play your hand.
Author: Randy Pausch

Quote: De la chance, pour en avoir, il faut la provoquer.
Author: Yoichi Hiruma

Quote: 20 minutes of doing something is more valuable than 20 hours of thinking about doing something.
Author: Unknown

Quote: On ne peut pas rattraper le temps perdu, mais on peut arrêter de perdre son temps.
Author: Jennifer Lawrence
